case.name: Godiva Hair
case.description: Videl removed her bra but positioned her twin tails to cover her nipples

trigger.state: Okay fine, get it out of your systems. Anyone who looks longer than 5 seconds is going to get 5 minutes worth of pain! Not like you can see much anyway... Heh.
Twin tails for the win! Hmph, and he told me I should cut my hair short...
This doesn't mean anything, okay? I don't know the meaning of the word defeat! This is totally in accordance with the rules by the way.
They're just breasts, so what? Every girl has them... speaking of which, go look at theirs!
So what do you think of my back up plan? You've always gotta keep a trick up your sleeve in a fight, and poker is no different!
Come on, did you realy think it would be that easy?
I guess I'm a pretty big tease aren't I? You're going to have to fight me for awhile longer now.
You guys didn't look while I took my bra off right? This kind of takes time and a bit of precision you know.
So, do you like them? What's that? You can't see them? Oh that's too bad...
Oh no, you're all staring at me... I made a mess, didn't I?
I don't even know what to think right now...
Ah... S-so can I put my clothes back on now? You know what, forget it.
After that I guess I might as well just stay naked...
I can't believe you guys saw that...
Maybe I shouldn't have been flying if that was going to happen...
Finally over... this has been a weird day...
